vista.graph
Class GEMultiBorderLayout

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GEBorderLayout
      vista.graph.GEMultiBorderLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
GELayoutManager
public class GEMultiBorderLayout
extends GEBorderLayout

Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions. The elements are sized by their preferred sizes for the NSEW positions with the remaining space going to the Center position. This is useful for laying out the axis elements in a Plot

Version:
$Id: GEMultiBorderLayout.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:58 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).
